channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 2026 Begins With a ‘Labyrinth’ Re-Release in Theaters
item.description: Before its sequel (probably) comes out, why not watch 'Labyrinth' on the big screen again next January?

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: The robotaxi expansion that really matters
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: Xiaomi 15T Pro vs iPhone 16 : comment choisir le meilleur smartphone ?
item.description: Vous pourriez avoir l'impression que l'on compare des choux et des carottes, mais le fait est que le Xiaomi 15T Pro et l'iPhone 16 sont parmi les meilleurs smartphones que l'on puisse s'offrir, avec environ 800€ en poche. Alors, comment choisir ?

item.title: 7 superb Samsung storage deals that I'll be checking on this Black Friday
item.description: Black Friday is nearly here and these are the Samsung SSDs I'm keeping the closest eye on.

item.title: My favorite way to play the new League of Legends game is sold out everywhere, but Riot just dropped some great news
item.description: Riftbound's Proving Grounds is the best way to play the game. It's sold out, but will hopefully come back soon (maybe for Black Friday).

item.title: How much of the AI data center boom will be powered by renewable energy?
item.description: According to a new report from the International Energy Agency, the world will spend $580 billion on data centers this year — $40 billion more than will be spent finding new oil supplies.

item.title: Nvidia's new AI app could be the productivity tool you've always needed - "Hyperlink" agent brings private AI-powered search for your PC
item.description: Hyperlink uses local AI acceleration to deliver private, lightning-fast file searches powered by LLM reasoning and contextual understanding.

item.title: Le pré-Black Friday, c’est aussi deux enceintes Amazon Echo Spot pour le prix d’une
item.description: Doté d'un petit écran et d'un haut-parleur, l'Echo Spot d'Amazon est un réveil connecté qui nous fait aussi profiter de l'efficacité d'Alexa. Pendant le pré-Black Friday, Amazon en propose deux à 98,98 euros au lieu de 189,98 euros.

item.title: Samsung casse les prix de ses meilleurs produits Galaxy durant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Le pré-Black Friday a débuté il y a plus d’une semaine et les produits Samsung n’ont pas été épargnés. Des références récentes telles que le Galaxy S25 Ultra profite de remises inédites, ce qui permet de s’équiper avec la dernière génération à moindre coût pendant toute cette période promotionnelle.

item.title: Best Organic Mattresses (2025): Birch, Avocado, Naturepedic, More
item.description: These natural, organic mattresses are eco-friendly alternatives to conventional models and just as comfortable.

item.title: The best gifts for dads that have everything (but deserve more)
item.description: What do you get the man who says he has everything? It's a tough question - and one you have a limited amount of time to answer, given the holidays are nearly upon us. You could try dropping subtle hints or asking friends and family for suggestions, but they might save their best ideas for […]

item.title: SNL Weekend Update torches Trump over Epstein emails
item.description: On "Saturday Night Live"s Weekend Update, Colin Jost and Michael Che tackled the government shutdown, the Epstein emails, and more.

item.title: Italy vs Norway free streams: How to watch World Cup 2026 Qualifier, TV Schedule, Preview
item.description: We'll show you all the ways you can watch Italy vs Norway as Erling Haaland's team look destined for a spot at the 2026 World Cup.

item.title: How LimeWire ended the Napster music revolution
item.description: Quick: tell me how old you are by telling me which app you used to download free music. Was it Napster? Kazaa? Usenet? Gnutella? WinMX? Morpheus? The Pirate Bay? Were you, I don't know, sending your friends songs on AIM or BBM? The possibilities are endless. For a decade or so, if you were online, […]

item.title: Xiaomi profite du pré-Black Friday pour brader ses produits les plus populaires : les 13 offres à saisir
item.description: Xiaomi n’a pas attendu longtemps pour casser les prix lors du pré-Black Friday. De nombreux modèles phares de la marque sont concernés, même les plus récentes, comme le 15T. Dans cette sélection, vous trouverez les meilleurs produits du constructeur chinois aux meilleurs prix.
